ProductInfo.Features:
PROCESSOR: Intel Core i7-3520M (2.90 GHz | 3.60 GHz Turbo Boost, 4MB Cache)
MEMORY: 8GB DDR3 SDRAM (1600MHz)
HARD DRIVE: 1TB (1024GB)
OPTICAL DRIVE: DVD±RW
DISPLAY: 17.3" HD+ LED Backlit WideScreen
SCREEN RESOLUTION: 1600 x 900
WEBCAM: 720P HD Resolution
GRAPHICS: INTEL HD 4000
WIRELESS: 802.11b/g/n
BLUETOOTH 4.0
2-IN-1 CARD READER
HD GRAPHICS SUPPORT AND HDMI OUTPUT
OPERATING SYSTEM: Windows 8 64-Bit
PORTS: 2x USB 3.0, 2x USB 2.0 (4 USB total), HDMI-out, VGA, 2-in-1 card reader (SD, MMC), RJ-45 (ethernet), headphone (3.5mm), microphone (3.5mm)
BATTERY: 6-cell lithium ion
BATTERY LIFE: Up to 4 hours
KEYBOARD: Full-size keyboard, multimedia Fn keys, recovery key. Numeric keypad on right of keyboard. Two-button touch pad with scroll feature
ProductInfo.Name: Lenovo Ideapad G780 Performance Laptop - Intel Core i7-3520M, 8GB RAM, 1TB HDD, 17.3" HD+ Display, DVD±RW, Intel HD4000 Graphics, Bluetooth, USB 3.0, Windows 8 (Dark Brown / Brushed Metal)
